targetLine.text: Well, I hope I'm not disturbing anything.
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part III

contextBefore.text: Why, hello. This is quite a surprise.

contextAfter.text: Oh no, we were just doing a little model railroading.

Emmett, when my bags were thrown from the wagon, my telescope was damaged. And...since you expressed an interest...in science, I thought you might be able to repair it for me. I would pay you, of course.
Oh, no, no, no, I wouldn't think of charging you for this. Well, let's have a look at it.

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
